Round 2 Operation Phase
Desc: <color=#00FF00>Green</color> Bombs will explode in the <color=#00FF00>3x3</color> area. <color=#34AFF8>Blue</color> Bombs will explode in the diagonal path. <color=#FFFF00>Yellow</color> Bombs will explode in the cross-shaped area.
